Name: Morenci
Description: Morenci Gang is a band of deserters and failed mercenaries led by former Lyrian Hauptmann, certain Mordecai Beaumunt. They are run of the mill criminals with exception that they have wield some heavy firepower.
ReputationStatements: You wanna get paid, don't you? Take this job, and we all end up with more money. You've nothing to lose.
